title: Back to Basics
description: After making a large map with slopes, scripts, all new resources and whatnot, I felt like making something very basic. Also used this opportunity to get some maps that were gathering dust finished and released; a very old episode 2 project (although I have released e2m1 of that project before as e2m1er.wad), and a project for EDGE that got to 1½ levels (Rust). The maps were converted to use vanilla resources only (except for the sky). E2M5-E2M9 however are brand new levels for this release. T...
